© Ya Yin Chang 2016

Ya Yin Chang (1995)
張 雅 茵

Intending to become a designer and front-end developer, I'm now focusing on graphic design as well as the development of website.

As a student, I'm still learning and improving myself with great passion. There is no reason to refuse any opportunity for becoming better, please feel free to contact me :-)

2nd Internship @ Albert Lan Creative

It's a Creative Agancy that provides great design, web development, animation and market strategies for clients.

I take part in ALC as an assistant of both design and development department.

This was the last part of my JavaScript Club Course of NCC.

MoreDec. 19
2015 Hack Hsinchu City

The first Hackathon I participated. I was invited by one of my colleague in EXMA and we had a great time making an official website for Hsinchu City.

To our surprise, we won the third-place of the competition :-D

MoreNov. 28
Javascript Club Course @ NCC

We held three courses of different programming languages this semester and I was responsible of JavaScript.

By teaching 2 hours a week, I introduced the begainners to the world of programming. It was very challenging and I learnt a lot.

It's a team master in application development. They provide development of high-scaling websites and technical consulting.

I'm responsible of front-end development in EXMA and keep improving my skill.

Oct. 01 - Now
Designer & Coach @ NTUST Coding Club

NTUST Coding Club, also known as NCC, is a club based in NTUST. It aims to teach people without experience about programming.

After I joining the club for a year, I became the designer of the club as well as the coach of JavaScript Club Course.

Sep. 14 - Now
2015 LTSH Web Design Workshop

The workshop was held by one of my classmate. He was graduated from LTSH and eagered to bring what he had learnt back to his school.

He asked me for help so I became one of the coaches and we taught about web design.
